climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Faux rabbit fur rug : Top-quality faux rabbit fur, providing super soft and silky touch. Transform your bedroom or living room into a cozy haven with our fluffy and shaggy faux fur rug. Airy 3D bubble shape, light and agile as snowballs. Simple but no monotonous, easy to create a warm and cozy atmosphere.

Perfect size : This 2x3 feet light grey fluffy rug is perfect to makes a cozy and warm cushion on the cold floor or your hard chair. And also good for nursery or fireplace decoration to create a warm and luxurious atmosphere.
Easy to clean ：Machine washable in cold water, low temperature drying or lay flat to dry. Local stains can be wiped with a damp rag or vacuumed.
Rubber non-slip backing ：Rubber backing makes it firmly fixed on the floor and won't shift when moving the furnitures. The edges are flat and will not warp, protecting you and your family’s safety.

Attention: To provide you with an incredibly soft and silky touching, the plush surface is velvety, so please do not place it in a location where the elderly or children frequently move around. Be careful when walking on it to avoid slipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thiscrug is gorgeous and high quality. So glad I purchased it,!! I will be buying more. Super soft and well made. Looks high end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Unbelievably silky soft slick feeling!!!! Like I swear to you, if you felt this and were blindfolded you would swear it's real rabbit fur!!!! Honestly, I am blown away by this Ashler Faux Rabbit Fur Rug for Christmas, Black 2x6 FT Fluffy Soft Runner Area Rug, Rectangle Machine Washable Shaggy Fur Carpet!I have no idea how they accomplished this, but I LOVE it! I got it in black, and it's a true inky jet black color, not one of those that is supposed to be black but really isn't which you can only tell when you put other colors up against it. My hardest choice was deciding what color to get this in as they are all so beautiful! To get this item and it's machine washable too just WOW! I sure hope it does not change the feel of it!I can honestly imagine laying several of these down together to cover a larger area, that would just be heaven to my feet! LOL The pile is a good length, there really is no padding though and on the back is the rubberized to help prevent it shifting. Don't know that will for sure stop it from shifting when my female rottie gets to bouncing around as she does (she's a goofball LOL) and not sure that would be a fair test for the rug either. LOL A robovac may have an issue with this rug.But the rug is slick enough feeling I would be careful walking on it so you do not fall and I would for sure not try running across it LOL. So do be mindful where you place it, may not be the best option with young children or elderly.Personally I am excellent with the quality/features of this rug VS the price. The listing has it at $40.99 currently. You can get a cheaper rug, not going to argue that point, BUT if you want one that is truly the best imitation I have ever found for rabbit fur then this is THE rug for you!As always I only do honest reviews and will update if needed. I hope this helps you make the best choices on how to spend your $.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fur Real: Unbearably Cozy Centerpiece of My Winter Living Room
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely thrilled with my Ashler Faux Rabbit Fur Rug in light grey, size 2x6. As soon as I saw it, I knew it was the perfect addition to my living room. I already had a similar white faux rabbit fur throw that all my guests fight over in the winter, so I was eager to add this rug to my collection.Although it's technically designed to be used as a rug, I had a different idea in mind. I wanted to use it as a luxurious and soft top for my upholstered ottoman. It fits perfectly, and the moment I placed it on top, my living room was transformed into a cozy and inviting space.The rug is incredibly soft and has a bubbled surface that adds to its fluffy softness. The light grey color is the perfect complement to my grey living room and looks absolutely beautiful. It exceeded my expectations and is definitely one of the best orders I've made for my home.What's even better is that the rug is completely washable and easy to maintain. I can simply toss it in the washing machine, and it comes out looking just as good as new. The only challenge I'm currently facing is convincing my cats to share it with me! I highly recommend this rug to anyone looking for a comfortable, cozy, and luxurious addition to their home decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So soft, and quite pretty...but will it hold up?
reviews.reviewText: It's pretty and soft and cheap. Will it really hold up? Hard to say. I realize I cannot vacuum this...I can only use the teensy handheld vac I use for my bunny cage. Hard to imagine it will withstand the washing machine. We (me and teen) like it though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars L🤍VE ~ L🐰VE ~ L🐇VE
reviews.reviewText: I was NOT expecting this to be so soft and pretty! I have ordered a handful of fur throws and rugs and I never know what to expect.. this rug exceeded my expectations!My home decor has a white theme.No matter where I put this, it will look beautiful. Now the hardest decision is finding a place to put it. I don't know if I should use it as a decor rug or use it as a throw like over my sectional or back cushions. Ugh decisions decisions 🙄I was drinking espresso and the cup knocked over and got all over the rug. I threw it in the washing machine using cold water and on a short delicate cycle and air dry. Once dry I put it in the dryer on tumble for 10 min. I was so nervous that I would ruin it BUT it washed/dried beautifully!The quality is amazing and the rug is so so soft like your petting a bunny. 🤍🐇🤍🐰I highly recommend purchasing!GREAT QUALITY • AFFORDABLE • GIFTABLE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Lovely But Dangerous
reviews.reviewText: It is truly beautiful and so, so soft...and slick as an ice rink. I laid it down and put my socked foot on it...and my leg slide clear across the top of the rug - to reiterate, I'm talking about the top of the rug - the non-slip bottom is great and stayed in place on the floor.. I tried it barefoot - not quite like an ice rink, but very close.It's very, very beautiful, but someone is going to get injured using this as a rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So incredibly soft - but follow tag instructions and wash before use
reviews.reviewText: I had gotten this to replaec a furry blanket/rug that my dog uses on a daily basis. Yes, my dog is very spoiled. I almost didn't give it to him because I could imagine waking up and stepping onto this luxuriously soft rug when I got out of bed. It was a very tough decision.Do follow the instructions and wash before use. It's quite easy to wash and toss in the dryer. I suspect if you don't wash first the carpet may shed more than you'd like. It may also contain chemicals from manufacturing. That's something I always watch for with my dog is chemical fumes from something like a carpet.The price isn't bad for the size. I may buy another one just for the side of my bed.Recommended.
